Zhong Yu Coal Mine is a shaft coal mine located in Qinyuan County, Changzhi City, Shanxi Province

operators: 霍州煤电集团沁安煤电有限责任公司
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Huozhou Coal Electricity Group Qinan Coal Electricity Co., Ltd. and owned by Shanxi Coking Coal Group and China Cinda Asset Management Company.
